siteMetadata.name: Liza Katz
siteMetadata.title: Liza Katz | GenAI & Search Consultant | Make AI Make Sense
siteMetadata.about:
Hi, I'm Liza Katz. (aka Lizozom)


I am a Senior Software Engineer and Consultant with over 20 years of experience building large-scale backend systems.


While the industry chases hype, I focus on the complex intersection of Search Infrastructure (Elasticsearch/OpenSearch) and Generative AI. I help companies move RAG and vector search from "promising POC" to scalable production architecture.


Beyond consulting, I believe in demystifying technology. I created the "WTF Are Embeddings?" talk, I deliver workshops, lead hackathons and speak frequently at events like PyCon and BuildStuff.


When I'm not debugging pipelines, I'm designing interiors, listening to ABBA, or negotiating with my three cats: Pita, Chooka, and Chonky.

markdownRemark.excerpt: I’m happy to share that I have earned the AWS Certified Data Engineer – Associate certification. The AWS Certified Data Engineer – Associate validates skills…
markdownRemark.html:
I’m happy to share that I have earned the AWS Certified Data Engineer – Associate certification.

The AWS Certified Data Engineer – Associate validates skills and knowledge in core data-related AWS services, including the ability to ingest and transform data, orchestrate data pipelines while applying programming concepts, design data models, manage data lifecycles, and ensure data quality.

You can learn more about this certification on the official AWS page.

frontmatter.title: Certification: AWS Certified Data Engineer – Associate
frontmatter.description: Achieved AWS Certified Data Engineer – Associate certification, validating expertise in data ingestion, transformation, orchestration, and data lifecycle management on AWS.
frontmatter.author: Liza Katz
